DOC.brief_summary: GSK233705 high-affinity specific muscarinic receptor ( mAChR ) antagonist develop treatment chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . This randomised , double-blind , placebo-controlled , dose ascending , parallel group study examine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics twice daily inhaled dos GSK233705B 7 day , COPD subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Ascending , Study To Examine The Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics And Pharmacodynamics Of GSK233705B .

Subject FEV1/FVC < 0.7 postbronchodilator ( 200µg salbutamol ) . Capable give write informed consent , include compliance requirement restriction list consent form .
